mapper.select: SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo;
SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo WHERE hotelprovince=#{prov} and hotelcity=#{city}
SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo WHERE hotelprice BETWEEN #{lowest} AND #{highest}
SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo WHERE hotelid=#{hotelId}
SELECT ownername, ownerphone, hotelid, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, favornum, hotelprice, hoteladdress FROM hotelinfo WHERE #{type} LIKE '%#{keyword}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelinfo (ownername, ownerphone, hotelimage, hotelprovince, hotelcity, hotelprice, hoteladdress) VALUES (#{ownerName}, #{ownerPhone}, #{hotelImage}, #{hotelProvince}, #{hotelCity}, #{hotelPrice}, #{hotelAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE hotelinfo SET ownername=#{ownerName}, ownerphone=#{ownerPhone}, hotelimage=#{hotelImage}, hotelprovince=#{hotelProvince}, hotelcity=#{hotelCity}, hotelprice=#{hotelPrice}, hoteladdress=#{hotelAddress} WHERE hotelid=#{hotelId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hotelinfo ORDER BY favornum DESC limit 6;
